parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The number of the page to return.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Default value: 20.

parameters.name: RegistryNameLike
parameters.description: The name of the image repository. Fuzzy match is supported.

parameters.name: RegistryTypeNotInList
parameters.description: The types of excluded image repositories.

parameters.name: SourceIp
parameters.description: The source IP address of the request.
